'''Heated Battle Mode: Reinforcements''' is an [[Event]] for [[Genius Invokation TCG]] in [[Version 4.1]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2023/10/21 10:00:00 – 2023/10/30 03:59:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete the Archon Quest "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the World Quest "[[Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards]]"

===Summary===
* After the event starts, Travelers can go to the Invitation Board of The Cat's Tail to participate in "Genius Invokation TCG" duels under the special rules of "Heated Battle Mode."
* The special rule for this edition is: <section begin="special_rule" />Character switches will be considered as Fast Actions. Every time you defeat an opposing character, the turn-initiative remains with you.<br>The following Cards cannot be used in this edition of Heated Battle Mode: [[Fischl (Character Card)|Fischl]], [[Collei (Character Card)|Collei]], and [[Tighnari (Character Card)|Tighnari]].<section end="special_rule" />
* Travelers can invite teammates or participate in duels via match-making after reaching Player Level 4.
